summary: The diff shows deployment-related changes including a manifest.json addition, updates to frontend routes, components, and backend logic. However, the diff appears to be a continuation of feature development rather than a deployment-only change. Key deployment artifacts like dfx.json configuration, canister deployment scripts, or IC-specific deployment configuration are not present in the diff. Several features mentioned in REQ-25 (social sharing buttons, Founding 50 Hosts landing page, PWA install button, service worker) are not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the StaySpread application to the Internet Computer network — the frontend canister must serve the React application at a deployed URL and the backend canister must be reachable
missing_requirements.reason: No IC deployment configuration (dfx.json, canister IDs, deploy scripts) or evidence of actual deployment to the Internet Computer network is present in the diff. The changes appear to be frontend/backend code modifications, not deployment artifacts.

missing_requirements.requirement: Social sharing buttons on listing and promoter dashboard pages
missing_requirements.reason: No social sharing button components or logic are added or referenced in the modified files. ListingDetail.tsx and the PromoterDashboard summary show no social share buttons.
No Founding50Hosts page or route is present in App.tsx or referenced in the file summaries.
While manifest.json is added, no service worker file (e.g., service-worker.js or sw.js) is present in the diff.
No install button component is added or referenced in the diff.
The file summary for PromoterDashboard describes referral link and earnings overview, but no tracking metrics such as click counts or conversion rates are evidenced in the diff changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend logic modifications including promoterCounts map, authorization mixins, and various query/shared functions
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request is deployment-only and explicitly states 'Do not modify any existing feature logic'. The backend/main.mo file shows code modifications beyond deployment configuration.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend component modifications including ListingCard referral code preservation, RootLayout changes, and ListingDetail route param updates
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'Do not modify any existing feature logic or UI — this is a deployment-only request'. These are code logic changes, not deployment changes.
